forum.name: guide
forum.description: the anyland guide with faq, frequently asked questions and their answers! help along, wiki style!

thread.title: copying an area

comments.text: you can copy a whole area if it's yours, or if the creator set it to "copyable" in the area settings.
to open the copy & paste dialog, click on the area dialog (the mountain icon on the main menu) and hit the center copy icon button.

thread.latestCommentText: to open the copy & paste dialog, click on the area dialog (the mountain icon on the main menu) and hit the center copy icon button.
